column2: What have been the most important reasons for your using marijuana or hashish? (Mark all that apply.)
column17: To experiment – to see what it’s like
column19: To feel good or get high
column20: To seek deeper insights and understanding
column21: To have a good time with my friends
column22: To fit in with a group I like
column23: To get away from my problems or troubles
column24: Because of boredom, nothing else to do
column27: To increase the effects of some other drug(s)
column28: To decrease (offset) the effects of some other drug(s)
column31: Because I am “hooked”- I feel I have to drink
